tours.title: Muktinath Bike Tour-11N/12D
tours.description: Ride to Mustang: 12-Day Himalayan Motorbike Adventure from KathmanduThe Journey of a LifetimeImagine this: you’re cruising through Nepal’s ever-changi...

activities.name: Adventure Sports
activities.description: Experience adventure activities

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Day 1: Welcome to Kathmandu (1,400m)
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            As your flight descends into the Kathmandu Valley, you’ll already sense the contrast—lush green hills ring the ancient city, and the chaos of Kathmandu pulses below. Our representative will greet you at Tribhuvan International Airport and transfer you to your hotel in the heart of the capital. Depending on your arrival time, you can explore the vibrant Thamel neighborhood or rest and recover from your journey. In the evening, join the team for a welcome dinner and a detailed briefing about your upcoming adventure — the route, safety protocols, and what to expect on the road.
📍Overnight: Kathmandu
 🍽 Meals: Welcome Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Day 2: Kathmandu Heritage Ride & Bike Preparation
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Today’s all about orientation — both cultural and practical. After breakfast, join your guide for a short ride around Kathmandu’s cultural gems like Swayambhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple), the sacred Pashupatinath Temple, and Boudhanath Stupa. It’s a chance to ease into riding mode while soaking in Nepal’s rich spiritual heritage. In the afternoon, finalize your paperwork, check your gear, and get fitted to your motorbike. A mechanic will help you do a full technical check. Later, the group will gather for a pre-departure talk with your road captain.
📍Overnight: Kathmandu
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Kathmandu to Bandipur
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~145 km | Ride Time: 5–6 hours
Start your engines! After an early breakfast, you’ll ride out of Kathmandu and hit the Prithvi Highway. The route follows the Trishuli River, with rolling hills and terraced fields keeping you company. Take a break midway for lunch before the road winds upward to the beautifully preserved hill town of Bandipur. Once a bustling trade hub between Tibet and India, Bandipur still exudes old-world charm with its cobbled streets, restored homes, and panoramic views of Manaslu and the Annapurna range. It’s the perfect first stop to ease into the journey.
📍Overnight: Bandipur
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 4
itinerary.description:
: Bandipur to Kusma
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~100 km |  Ride Time: 4–5 hours
The ride from Bandipur to Kusma is relatively short but rich in local flavor. Pass through picturesque villages, terraced farms, and mid-hill settlements. As you approach Kusma, the landscape becomes more dramatic, with deep gorges and hanging bridges. In fact, Kusma is known for having one of the world’s highest suspension bridges, stretching over the Kaligandaki Gorge. The town is calm and lesser explored, offering a peaceful overnight stop with stunning views and cultural charm.
📍Overnight: Kusma
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 5
itinerary.description:
: Kusma to Lete
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~110 km |  Ride Time: 5–6 hours
Now the adventure intensifies. After breakfast, ride through Beni — the gateway to Mustang — and gradually ascend alongside the Kali Gandaki River. The tarmac gives way to gravel as the air grows thinner. This stretch offers thrilling off-road riding and raw, untouched scenery. You’ll ride under cascading waterfalls, across wooden bridges, and past wild cliffs as you approach Lete, a small settlement nestled beneath Nilgiri and Dhaulagiri. This is true Himalayan wilderness.
📍Overnight: Lete
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 6
itinerary.description:
: Lete to Muktinath
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~80 km | Ride Time: 5 hours
Today, you’re riding to Mustang's spiritual core — Muktinath. Pass through Marpha, a beautiful Thakali village famous for its apple orchards and whitewashed alleys. Continue through Jomsom, the district headquarters, and begin your ascent to Muktinath at 3,800 meters. The journey is challenging, with narrow tracks, loose gravel, and alpine winds. Upon reaching, visit the revered Muktinath Temple, where 108 water taps and an eternal flame await. It’s a sacred site for both Hindus and Buddhists — a powerful place to pause and reflect.
📍Overnight: Muktinath
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 7
itinerary.description:
: Muktinath to Tatopani
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~100 km | Ride Time: 5–6 hours
After an early morning walk or meditation near the temple, you’ll start your descent back through the Kali Gandaki Valley. The ride down is smoother but still thrilling — with cliffs, switchbacks, and dramatic mountain views all around. By afternoon, you’ll arrive in Tatopani, a village named after its famous natural hot springs. Dip in the warm waters and let your muscles relax — a perfect remedy after several high-altitude riding days.
📍Overnight: Tatopani

itinerary.title: Day 8
itinerary.description:
: Tatopani to Pokhara
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~100 km | Ride Time: 5 hours
Continue your descent into the lowlands as pine forests give way to rice terraces and colorful towns. The ride is more comfortable today as you reach Pokhara, Nepal’s most popular lakeside city. Upon arrival, settle into your hotel, take a stroll along Phewa Lake, and enjoy the luxury of paved roads and laid-back cafés. A great evening to celebrate the halfway mark of your ride.
📍Overnight: Pokhara
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Day 9
itinerary.description:
: Pokhara Sightseeing
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After a series of long riding days, today is for rest and discovery. Wake up early if you like and ride up to Sarangkot for sunrise views over the Annapurna range. Later, visit Davis Falls, the World Peace Pagoda, or Gupteshwor Mahadev Cave. You can also try paragliding, ziplining, or boating — Pokhara is the adventure capital of Nepal for good reason.
📍Overnight: Pokhara
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.title: Day 10
itinerary.description:
: Pokhara to Gorkha
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~115 km | Ride Time: 5–6 hours
Leave behind the tourist buzz of Pokhara and head toward Gorkha, a historically rich town. The route cuts through peaceful rural landscapes, dotted with farming terraces and tiny tea shops. Gorkha is known as the birthplace of King Prithvi Narayan Shah, the unifier of Nepal. You can visit the Gorkha Durbar (palace) perched on a hill, offering sweeping views of the Himalayas.
📍Overnight: Gorkha
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 11
itinerary.description:
: Gorkha to Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Distance: ~135 km |Ride Time: 5–6 hours
Your last day of riding! Retrace your journey back to Kathmandu via scenic highways. As you return to the bustling city, you’ll carry with you the dust, memories, and pride of having completed one of Nepal’s most iconic bike rides. Celebrate your achievement with your fellow riders over a hearty farewell dinner.
📍Overnight: Kathmandu
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast, Farewell Dinner

itinerary.title: Day 12
itinerary.description:
: Departure
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Depending on your flight time, enjoy a final breakfast and perhaps a quick souvenir run in Thamel. Our team will drop you off at the airport with a smile and a Namaste, marking the end of your incredible Himalayan journey.
📍Overnight: —
 🍽 Meals: Breakfast

tours.fitness_requirements: Good physical fitness required.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

tours.title: Muktinath Yatra - 6 Nights 7 Days by Flight
tours.description: Embark on a sacred pilgrimage to Muktinath Temple, one of the most revered Hindu and Buddhist temples in the Himalayas. Located at 3,710 meters in the Mustang district, this holy shrine is believed to grant salvation (moksha) to devotees. The temple houses 108 water spouts and an eternal flame, making it a unique spiritual destination. This comfortable journey by flight eliminates the need for long drives, allowing more time for spiritual contemplation and exploration of the mystical Mustang region.

activities.name: Temple Pilgrimage
activities.description: Sacred darshan at Muktinath Temple and spiritual ceremonies

activities.name: Cultural Exploration
activities.description: Explore Tibetan Buddhist culture and ancient monasteries

activities.name: Mountain Views
activities.description: Spectacular views of Annapurna and Dhaulagiri ranges

activities.name: Village Tours
activities.description: Visit traditional Thakali and Tibetan villages

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Welcome to Nepal! Upon arrival at Tribhuvan International Airport, our representative will receive you with traditional Khada and transfer you to your hotel in Kathmandu. After check-in and refreshment, attend a briefing about your sacred Muktinath Yatra. Visit Pashupatinath Temple in the evening for darshan and to witness the mesmerizing Ganga Aarti ceremony on the banks of the holy Bagmati River. This spiritual preparation sets the tone for your pilgrimage journey. Return to hotel for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Fly to Jomsom & Drive to Muktinath
itinerary.description: Early morning flight to Jomsom (2,720m), offering spectacular aerial views of the Annapurna and Dhaulagiri mountain ranges. The 20-minute scenic flight is an experience in itself, flying between towering peaks. Upon landing at Jomsom airport, drive to Muktinath Temple (3,710m) via the ancient trade route. The journey takes you through the mystical landscape of Mustang with its unique desert-like terrain. Check into hotel near Muktinath Temple and acclimatize to the altitude. Evening visit to Muktinath Temple for initial darshan and prayers.

itinerary.title: Muktinath Temple Darshan & Exploration
itinerary.description: Early morning visit to the sacred Muktinath Temple for the main darshan ceremony. This revered temple is significant for both Hindus and Buddhists, housing the eternal flame (Jwala Mai) that burns continuously from natural gas. Take a purifying bath under the 108 water spouts, each representing a sacred stream. The temple complex includes the main Vishnu temple, Buddhist gompa, and various shrines. Spend time in meditation and prayer. Afternoon exploration of the surrounding area including Jwala Mai Temple where natural gas creates an eternal flame. Experience the spiritual energy of this high-altitude sacred site.

itinerary.title: Muktinath to Jomsom via Kagbeni
itinerary.description: After morning prayers at Muktinath Temple, drive to the ancient village of Kagbeni, known as the 'Gateway to Upper Mustang.' This medieval village with its narrow alleys, ancient monastery, and traditional Tibetan architecture offers a glimpse into the region's rich cultural heritage. Explore the Red Gompa (monastery) and interact with local Tibetan Buddhist communities. Continue to Jomsom, the administrative center of Mustang district. Visit the local market and experience the unique Thakali culture. Jomsom is famous for its apple orchards and strong afternoon winds. Overnight in Jomsom.

itinerary.title: Jomsom Exploration & Marpha Village
itinerary.description: Full day exploration of the Jomsom area. Visit Marpha village, famous for its apple brandy, dried fruits, and traditional white-washed houses. This picturesque village is known for its cleanliness and well-preserved Thakali culture. Tour local distilleries and taste the famous apple brandy. Visit the ancient Marpha Gompa and learn about Tibetan Buddhism. Return to Jomsom and explore the local bazaar. Visit Jomsom Gompa and interact with monks. The afternoon brings strong winds characteristic of this region, creating a unique natural phenomenon. Enjoy spectacular sunset views over the Himalayas.

itinerary.title: Fly to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Jomsom to Kathmandu, weather permitting. The return flight offers another opportunity to witness the magnificent Himalayan panorama from a different perspective. Upon arrival in Kathmandu, transfer to your hotel and freshen up. Afternoon visit to Swayambhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple) for thanksgiving prayers and to complete your spiritual journey. This ancient Buddhist stupa offers panoramic views of Kathmandu Valley. Evening free for shopping in Thamel or relaxation. Farewell dinner featuring traditional Nepali cuisine with cultural performances.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, enjoy some free time for final prayers, shopping, or relaxation. Visit local temples if time permits for final blessings. Our representative will assist with airport transfer according to your flight schedule. Depart with the sacred blessings of Muktinath and unforgettable memories of this spiritual journey. The pilgrimage to Muktinath is believed to cleanse sins and grant moksha (salvation), making this a truly transformative experience.

tours.fitness_requirements: Moderate fitness level required due to high altitude. Basic walking ability needed for temple visits.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

tours.title: Mustang Flight & Drive Tour - 5 Days
tours.description: Experience the mystical kingdom of Mustang with a perfect combination of flight and drive. Explore ancient monasteries, dramatic landscapes, and unique Tibetan culture in the rain shadow of the Himalayas.
highlights: Flight to Jomsom with mountain views

activities.name: Cultural Tours

activities.name: Adventure Sports

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Early morning flight from Kathmandu to Pokhara, then scenic flight to Jomsom. Explore Jomsom bazaar and acclimatize to the altitude. Visit local monastery and enjoy mountain views.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Charang to Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Drive through dramatic landscapes to Charang village. Visit Charang monastery and continue to Lo Manthang, the ancient walled capital of Mustang. Explore the royal palace and monasteries.

itinerary.title: Explore Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Full day exploration of Lo Manthang. Visit Jampa Gompa, Thubchen Gompa, and Choprang Gompa. Experience local Tibetan culture and visit the King's Palace (if permitted).

itinerary.title: Lo Manthang to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Return journey to Jomsom via different route. Stop at Ghami village and see the longest mani wall in Nepal. Arrive in Jomsom and explore the local area.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Jomsom to Pokhara with stunning mountain views. Connect to Kathmandu flight or enjoy leisure time in Pokhara before evening flight to Kathmandu.

tours.fitness_requirements: Moderate physical fitness required. Some walking at high altitude.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 14 days before departure

tours.title: Nepal Golden Triangle Tour - 7 Nights 8 Days
tours.description: Discover Nepal's most popular destinations in this comprehensive golden triangle tour covering Kathmandu's heritage, Pokhara's natural beauty, and Chitwan's wildlife. This classic Nepal tour combines cultural exploration, mountain views, and jungle adventures, offering the perfect introduction to Nepal's diverse attractions. Experience ancient temples, pristine lakes, and exotic wildlife in one unforgettable journey.

activities.name: Cultural Tours
activities.description: Explore ancient temples, palaces, and UNESCO World Heritage sites

activities.name: Wildlife Safari
activities.description: Jungle safari and wildlife viewing in Chitwan National Park

activities.name: Mountain Views
activities.description: Spectacular Himalayan sunrise and mountain panoramas

activities.name: Boat Rides
activities.description: Peaceful boating on Phewa Lake and canoe rides in Chitwan

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Welcome to Nepal! Upon arrival at Tribhuvan International Airport, our representative will greet you with traditional Khada and marigold garlands. Transfer to your hotel in the heart of Kathmandu. After check-in and refreshment, visit the sacred Pashupatinath Temple in the evening to witness the mesmerizing Ganga Aarti ceremony on the banks of the holy Bagmati River. This spiritual experience provides a perfect introduction to Nepal's rich Hindu culture. Return to hotel for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu City Sightseeing
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day exploration of Kathmandu's UNESCO World Heritage sites. Begin with Jala Narayan Temple, then visit the ancient Swayambhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple), perched atop a hill offering panoramic views of Kathmandu Valley. Continue to the historic Kathmandu Durbar Square, the former royal palace complex showcasing exquisite Newari architecture, ancient courtyards, and the residence of the Living Goddess Kumari. End the day at Boudhanath Stupa, one of the largest Buddhist stupas in the world and a major pilgrimage site for Tibetan Buddhists. Evening at leisure in Thamel.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara via Manakamana
itinerary.description: After breakfast, begin the scenic drive to Pokhara. En route, stop at Kurintar for an exciting cable car ride to Manakamana Temple, situated at 1,302 meters above sea level. This sacred Hindu temple is dedicated to Goddess Bhagwati and is believed to fulfill the wishes of devotees. Enjoy breathtaking mountain views during the 10-minute cable car journey. Continue the drive through beautiful landscapes, terraced fields, and traditional villages to reach Pokhara. Check into lakeside hotel and enjoy the serene atmosphere of Phewa Lake. Evening free to explore the vibrant Lakeside area.

itinerary.title: Sarangkot Excursion & Pokhara Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Early morning drive to Sarangkot viewpoint (1,592m) to witness one of the world's most spectacular sunrises over the Annapurna and Dhaulagiri mountain ranges, including the iconic Machhapuchhre (Fishtail Mountain). Return to hotel for breakfast. Begin comprehensive Pokhara city tour visiting Bindabasini Temple, the patron deity of Pokhara. Explore the mysterious David Falls (Patale Chhango) where the Pardi Khola stream disappears into an underground tunnel. Visit Gupteshwor Cave, a sacred cave containing a Shiva lingam. Enjoy a peaceful boat ride on Phewa Lake and visit Tal Barahi Temple on the island. Evening at leisure for shopping and relaxation.

itinerary.title: Pokhara to Chitwan
itinerary.description: After breakfast, drive to Chitwan National Park, Nepal's first national park and a UNESCO World Heritage site. The journey takes you through changing landscapes from mountains to the flat Terai plains. Upon arrival at jungle resort, enjoy welcome drinks and check-in. In the afternoon, visit a traditional Tharu village to experience the unique culture and lifestyle of the indigenous Tharu people. Learn about their traditional houses, customs, and agricultural practices. In the evening, enjoy an authentic Tharu stick dance performance, showcasing their rich cultural heritage through traditional music and dance. Dinner at resort.

itinerary.title: Chitwan Safari Activities
itinerary.description: Full day of exciting jungle activities in Chitwan National Park. Begin with a peaceful canoe ride along the Rapti River to spot marsh mugger crocodiles, various bird species including kingfishers and herons. Visit the Elephant Breeding Center to learn about conservation efforts for Asian elephants. Take a guided jungle walk with experienced naturalists to discover the park's diverse flora and fauna. The highlight is an elephant-back safari or jeep safari through dense jungle in search of the endangered one-horned rhinoceros, elusive Bengal tigers, leopards, sloth bears, and various deer species. Evening at leisure at the resort.

itinerary.title: Chitwan to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: After breakfast and final jungle activities, drive back to Kathmandu through scenic countryside and traditional villages. The journey offers glimpses of rural Nepali life, terraced fields, and changing landscapes. Upon arrival in Kathmandu, check into hotel and freshen up. Afternoon and evening free for last-minute shopping in Thamel, known for its handicrafts, carpets, pashmina shawls, and souvenirs. Visit local markets and enjoy authentic Nepali cuisine at traditional restaurants. Overnight in Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, enjoy some free time for final shopping or relaxation. Our representative will assist with airport transfer according to your flight schedule. Depart with unforgettable memories of Nepal's cultural heritage, natural beauty, and wildlife encounters. We hope this golden triangle tour has provided you with a comprehensive taste of Nepal's diverse attractions and warm hospitality.

tours.fitness_requirements: Basic fitness level required for walking and light activities.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

tours.title: Nepal Heritage Tour - 5 Nights 6 Days
tours.description: Immerse yourself in Nepal's rich cultural heritage with this comprehensive tour covering UNESCO World Heritage sites in Kathmandu Valley. Explore ancient temples, medieval palaces, and traditional architecture that showcase Nepal's glorious past. This cultural journey takes you through the living museums of Kathmandu, Patan, and Bhaktapur, where centuries-old traditions continue to thrive. Experience the spiritual essence of Nepal through its sacred sites, vibrant festivals, and warm hospitality of the Newar people.
inclusions: All entrance fees to heritage sites

activities.name: Heritage Site Tours
activities.description: Explore UNESCO World Heritage sites with expert cultural guides

activities.name: Architecture Appreciation
activities.description: Study ancient Newari architecture and wood carving techniques

activities.name: Cultural Immersion
activities.description: Experience traditional festivals, ceremonies, and local customs

activities.name: Art and Craft
activities.description: Visit traditional workshops and observe master craftsmen at work

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Welcome to the cultural heart of Nepal! Upon arrival at Tribhuvan International Airport, our representative will greet you with traditional Khada and transfer you to your heritage hotel in Kathmandu. After check-in and refreshment, begin your cultural journey with a visit to Kathmandu Durbar Square, the former royal palace complex. Explore the ancient courtyards, intricate wood carvings, and meet the Living Goddess Kumari if she appears at her window. Visit the Hanuman Dhoka Palace and learn about Nepal's royal history. Evening welcome dinner with traditional Newari cuisine and cultural performances.

itinerary.title: Swayambhunath & Patan Heritage Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, visit Swayambhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple), perched atop a hill overlooking Kathmandu Valley. This ancient Buddhist stupa is over 2,000 years old and offers panoramic views of the valley. Observe the harmonious coexistence of Hindu and Buddhist traditions. Drive to Patan, also known as Lalitpur (City of Beauty), famous for its exquisite Newari architecture and metalwork. Explore Patan Durbar Square with its stunning temples, courtyards, and the former royal palace. Visit the Golden Temple (Hiranya Varna Mahavihar) and observe traditional Buddhist rituals. Tour local workshops to see master craftsmen creating traditional metalwork and wood carvings.

itinerary.title: Bhaktapur Medieval City Tour
itinerary.description: Full day exploration of Bhaktapur, the best-preserved medieval city in Nepal. This living museum showcases authentic Newari culture and architecture. Begin at Bhaktapur Durbar Square with its 55-window palace, Vatsala Temple, and the famous Nyatapola Temple, a five-story pagoda representing the five elements. Visit Pottery Square to watch traditional pottery making using ancient techniques. Explore Dattatreya Square with its medieval temples and traditional houses. Experience local life by walking through narrow alleys, observing daily rituals, and tasting traditional Newari snacks like 'juju dhau' (king curd) and 'bara' (lentil pancakes). Return to Kathmandu in the evening.

itinerary.title: Pashupatinath & Boudhanath Exploration
itinerary.description: Begin with an early morning visit to Pashupatinath Temple, the most sacred Hindu temple in Nepal dedicated to Lord Shiva. Observe morning rituals, cremation ceremonies on the ghats, and interact with colorful sadhus (holy men). This UNESCO World Heritage site provides deep insights into Hindu traditions and the cycle of life and death. Continue to Boudhanath Stupa, one of the largest Buddhist stupas in the world and a major pilgrimage site for Tibetan Buddhists. Walk around the stupa with pilgrims, spin prayer wheels, and visit surrounding monasteries. Experience the peaceful atmosphere and observe monks in prayer. Evening visit to a traditional Tibetan monastery for meditation session.

itinerary.title: Changu Narayan & Cultural Workshops
itinerary.description: Visit Changu Narayan Temple, the oldest Hindu temple in Nepal dating back to the 4th century. This UNESCO World Heritage site is dedicated to Lord Vishnu and features the finest examples of stone, wood, and metal craft. The temple offers spectacular views of the Himalayas and surrounding countryside. Afternoon visit to traditional craft workshops in Thimi, famous for pottery and paper-making. Participate in hands-on activities like pottery making, traditional paper production from lokta bark, and observe mask-making techniques. Visit a traditional Newari house to experience authentic local hospitality and learn about traditional architecture and lifestyle.

itinerary.title: Final Heritage Sites & Departure
itinerary.description: Final morning exploration of any missed heritage sites or revisit your favorite locations for photography and deeper appreciation. Visit the Garden of Dreams, a neo-classical garden that provides a peaceful retreat in the heart of Kathmandu. Last-minute shopping in Thamel for traditional handicrafts, thangka paintings, singing bowls, and souvenirs. Our representative will assist with airport transfer according to your flight schedule. Depart with a deep appreciation of Nepal's rich cultural heritage and unforgettable memories of ancient traditions that continue to thrive in modern times.

tours.fitness_requirements: Basic fitness level required for walking and climbing temple stairs. Suitable for all age groups.

tours.title: Nepal Tour by Flight - 4 Nights 5 Days
tours.description: Experience Nepal from a unique perspective with this exciting tour featuring scenic mountain flights and ground exploration. This compact yet comprehensive tour combines the thrill of mountain flights with cultural immersion, offering spectacular aerial views of the Himalayas including Mount Everest, followed by ground tours of Nepal's most significant cultural and natural attractions. Perfect for travelers with limited time who want to maximize their Nepal experience with both aerial and terrestrial adventures.
highlights: Aerial views of world's highest peaks

activities.name: Mountain Flights

activities.name: Cultural Tours

itinerary.title: Arrival & Everest Mountain Flight
itinerary.description: Welcome to Nepal! Upon arrival at Tribhuvan International Airport, our representative will meet you and transfer you to your hotel in Kathmandu. After check-in and refreshment, prepare for the highlight of your trip - the Everest Mountain Flight. This one-hour scenic flight takes you close to the world's highest peaks, offering unparalleled views of Mount Everest, Lhotse, Nuptse, Ama Dablam, and other towering giants of the Himalayas. Each passenger gets a window seat and receives a mountain identification chart. The flight provides a unique perspective of the Everest region that would otherwise require weeks of trekking to experience. Return to hotel and rest. Evening briefing about the upcoming tour.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Sightseeing & Flight to Pokhara
itinerary.description: After breakfast, explore Kathmandu's cultural treasures with visits to UNESCO World Heritage sites. Begin at Swayambhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple) for panoramic valley views and spiritual ambiance. Continue to Kathmandu Durbar Square to explore ancient palaces, courtyards, and meet the Living Goddess Kumari. Visit Pashupatinath Temple, the most sacred Hindu temple in Nepal, and observe religious ceremonies on the banks of the Bagmati River. Afternoon flight to Pokhara, offering spectacular aerial views of the Annapurna and Manaslu mountain ranges. The 25-minute flight showcases Nepal's diverse topography from the Kathmandu Valley to the lake city of Pokhara. Check into lakeside hotel and enjoy the serene atmosphere.

itinerary.title: Pokhara Exploration & Mountain Views
itinerary.description: Early morning drive to Sarangkot viewpoint (1,592m) to witness one of the world's most spectacular sunrises over the Annapurna and Dhaulagiri mountain ranges. Watch as the first rays of sunlight illuminate the snow-capped peaks, creating a golden glow on mountains including Machhapuchhre (Fishtail Mountain). Return to hotel for breakfast. Begin comprehensive Pokhara sightseeing including Bindabasini Temple, David Falls (Patale Chhango), and Gupteshwor Cave. Enjoy a peaceful boat ride on Phewa Lake and visit Tal Barahi Temple situated on an island. Explore the International Mountain Museum to learn about mountaineering history and Himalayan culture. Evening free to explore the vibrant Lakeside area with its restaurants, cafes, and shops.

itinerary.title: Pokhara to Kathmandu Flight & Heritage Tour
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Pokhara to Kathmandu, offering another opportunity to enjoy aerial mountain views from a different angle. Upon arrival, continue your cultural exploration with visits to Boudhanath Stupa, one of the largest Buddhist stupas in the world and a major pilgrimage site for Tibetan Buddhists. Walk around the stupa with pilgrims, spin prayer wheels, and visit surrounding monasteries. Continue to Patan Durbar Square, known for its exquisite Newari architecture and metalwork. Explore the ancient courtyards, temples, and visit the Golden Temple (Hiranya Varna Mahavihar). Tour traditional workshops to observe master craftsmen creating intricate metalwork and wood carvings. Evening farewell dinner with cultural performances showcasing traditional Nepali music and dance.

itinerary.title: Final Sightseeing & Departure
itinerary.description: Final morning in Nepal with optional activities based on your flight schedule. If time permits, visit Bhaktapur Durbar Square, the best-preserved medieval city in Nepal, or explore Thamel for last-minute shopping of traditional handicrafts, pashmina shawls, and souvenirs. Visit the Garden of Dreams for a peaceful retreat in the heart of Kathmandu. Our representative will assist with airport transfer according to your flight schedule. Depart with incredible memories of Nepal's majestic mountains viewed from both air and ground, along with rich cultural experiences that showcase the country's diverse heritage and natural beauty.

what_to_bring: Warm jacket for early morning flights

tours.title: Pokhara and Sarangkot Tour 2N/3D
tours.description: Pokhara & Sarangkot Tour from Kathmandu: A Journey to Nepal’s SerenityWhen it comes to travel in Nepal, Pokhara and Sarangkot remain timeless favorite...

activities.name: Cultural Tours

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Arrive in the beautiful city of Pokhara
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            arrive in the beautiful city of Pokhara after a scenic drive or short flight from Kathmandu. After hotel check-in, spend your afternoon exploring the calm surroundings of Phewa Lake with a relaxing boat ride to Tal Barahi Temple, followed by a visit to Davis Falls and the mystical Gupteshwor Cave. In the evening, enjoy a peaceful stroll along Lakeside, filled with lively cafés, shops, and a vibrant atmosphere.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Drive to Sarangkot
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Wake up early for a drive or cable car ride to Sarangkot, where you’ll witness a breathtaking sunrise over the snow-capped peaks of Annapurna, Dhaulagiri, and Machhapuchhre. After returning for breakfast, continue with a half-day sightseeing tour covering the Bindhyabasini Temple, the International Mountain Museum, and the serene World Peace Pagoda, offering panoramic views of the valley. Adventure lovers can also add paragliding or zip-lining from Sarangkot for an extra thrill.

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Boating experience and Return to Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Enjoy a leisurely breakfast and perhaps a final walk or boating experience at Phewa Lake before bidding farewell to Pokhara. You will then depart for Kathmandu or your onward destination, carrying with you unforgettable memories of Pokhara’s natural beauty and Sarangkot’s magical sunrise.

tours.title: Pokhara Complete Experience – 5 Days

From sunrise at Sarangkot and lake adventures to caves, cultural gems, and nearby hidden escapes like Begnas and Kusma, this package offers couples and explorers a perfect mix of leisure, thrill, and discovery. Experience the best of Pokhara with scenic flights, spiritual sites, adventure activities, and local cultural immersion.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu → Pokhara

Check into your lakeside hotel and settle in. Evening at leisure with optional lakeside walk along the vibrant Lakeside area, café hopping, or simply relaxing by Phewa Lake. The evening is perfect for acclimatizing to Pokhara's serene atmosphere. Overnight in Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Pokhara Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Early morning drive to Sarangkot (1,592m) for a breathtaking sunrise over the Annapurna range, Dhaulagiri, and Machhapuchhre (Fishtail) mountain. After sunrise, visit the sacred Bindabasini Temple, one of the oldest temples in Pokhara. Continue to Davis Falls (Patale Chhango) and explore the mysterious Gupteswor Cave with its impressive limestone formations. Evening visit to World Peace Stupa or Pumdikot Shiva Temple for sunset views over Pokhara valley. Return to hotel for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Pokhara Adventure Day
itinerary.description: Morning ultralight flight (30 minutes) over Pokhara valley for aerial views of the Himalayas and lakes, or opt for paragliding for a more adventurous experience. After breakfast, drive to Kusma (2 hours) for sky bridge walk experience - one of the world's highest suspension bridges. Optional activities include bungee jumping or swing for thrill-seekers. The sky bridge offers spectacular views of the Kaligandaki River gorge. Return to Pokhara in the evening. Overnight in Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Begnas & Local Culture
itinerary.description: Morning drive to Begnas Lake (15 km from Pokhara), a pristine and less crowded alternative to Phewa Lake. Enjoy peaceful boating on the crystal-clear waters surrounded by lush hills. Visit Majhikuna village for authentic cultural experience and taste local fish dishes prepared in traditional style. Interact with local communities and learn about their lifestyle. Afternoon return to Pokhara for leisure time in Lakeside cafés, shopping for souvenirs, or simply relaxing by Phewa Lake. Overnight in Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Pokhara → Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Free morning in Pokhara for last-minute shopping at Lakeside markets, final lakeside walk, or relaxing at your hotel. Visit local shops for handicrafts, pashmina, or trekking gear. Check out from hotel and transfer to Pokhara airport for flight back to Kathmandu (25 minutes) or begin drive back to Kathmandu (6-7 hours). Trip concludes with drop-off at your Kathmandu hotel or Tribhuvan International Airport as per your requirement.

what_to_bring: Light jacket for early morning sunrise
tours.fitness_requirements: Easy fitness level required. Suitable for all ages and fitness levels. Involves minimal walking and comfortable sightseeing activities.

booking_info.advance_booking: 5-7 days recommended for flight bookings and activity reservations
booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 3 days before departure. Flight-dependent packages subject to airline policies.

good_to_know.main_attractions: Breathtaking sunrise experience at Sarangkot with panoramic Annapurna views, scenic domestic flights with stunning Himalayan aerial perspectives, cultural exploration of Bindabasini Temple and World Peace Stupa, adventure activities at Kusma sky bridge, serene boating on both Phewa and Begnas lakes, and authentic cultural immersion at Majhikuna village.
good_to_know.travel_distances: Kathmandu to Pokhara domestic flight takes 25 minutes with mountain views, or 6-7 hours scenic drive option, Pokhara to Kusma requires 2 hours for sky bridge activities, Pokhara to Begnas Lake involves 30 minutes comfortable drive, and all local sightseeing within Pokhara area covers short distances.
good_to_know.accommodation_standards: Premium lakeside hotels in Pokhara with modern amenities and lake views, comfortable rooms with attached bathrooms, restaurant facilities, and convenient location for easy access to Lakeside area attractions, cafés, and shopping opportunities.
good_to_know.additional_activities: Optional paragliding experiences, extended hiking to additional viewpoints, spa treatments, cultural cooking classes, photography workshops, shopping tours in Lakeside markets, and extended village experiences are available with advance arrangement and additional costs.

faqs.question: Can this cultural itinerary be customized according to my preferences?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer flexible options including choice between flight or drive to Pokhara, extended stays for relaxation, upgraded accommodation standards, additional cultural sites, optional adventure activities like paragliding, or photography-focused extensions with professional guidance.

faqs.question: What specific items are included and excluded from the package price?
faqs.answer: Included are accommodation, daily breakfast, specified lunches, ground transportation, guided sightseeing tours, entrance fees to mentioned sites, Kusma sky bridge entry, and boating experiences. Excluded are domestic flights (optional), dinners, beverages, personal expenses, tips, optional activities, and travel insurance.

faqs.question: What is the cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations made 5 days before departure receive full refund (minus processing fees), 50% refund for cancellations within 2-4 days, and no refund for cancellations less than 1 day before departure. Flight-dependent packages subject to airline cancellation policies.

faqs.question: What is the best time for this cultural experience?
faqs.answer: The optimal time is September to May when weather is pleasant for sightseeing, clear mountain views are guaranteed for sunrise experiences, and comfortable temperatures make cultural exploration and outdoor activities most enjoyable throughout the day.

faqs.question: How do I book this cultural trip?
faqs.answer: Booking is simple through Gomayu travel agency - contact our cultural tour specialists, use our online booking platform with secure payment, or visit our office for personalized consultation about flight options and cultural activity preferences.

tours.title: Pokhara Super Adventure Package – 5 Days
tours.description: The Pokhara Super Adventure Package 5 Days is your high-energy escape that links Kusma's sky adventures, Pokhara's lakeside charm, and the white-water rush of the Trishuli. Travel the scenic route from Kathmandu to Kusma to Pokhara to Malekhu and back to Kathmandu. Kick off with a sky breakfast and your choice of bungee or swing at The Cliff. In Pokhara, greet the morning with a 30-minute ultralight flight, ride an ATV for 70 minutes, and unwind with boating or kayaking on Fewa Lake.
highlights: Sky breakfast and bungee/swing at The Cliff, Kusma
Boating and kayaking on Fewa Lake
Scenic drive through Sarangkot with Annapurna views
Professional safety gear and expert guides
inclusions: Private ground transfers throughout the trip
Accommodation in clean resorts (Kusma, Pokhara, Malekhu)
Bungee jump or swing (choice of one)
Professional safety gear for all activities
exclusions: Extra activities not mentioned in itinerary

activities.name: Bungee Jumping
activities.description: Experience the thrill of bungee jumping from The Cliff in Kusma with professional safety equipment

activities.name: Ultralight Flight
activities.description: 30-minute scenic flight over Pokhara valley with stunning Annapurna mountain views

activities.name: ATV Adventure
activities.description: 70-minute all-terrain vehicle ride through scenic trails around Pokhara

activities.name: Water Sports
activities.description: Boating and kayaking on the pristine Fewa Lake

activities.name: White-water Rafting
activities.description: 2-hour exciting rafting adventure on Trishuli River

activities.name: Sightseeing
activities.description: Scenic drives through Sarangkot and lakeside exploration

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Kusma
itinerary.description: Drive from Kathmandu to Kusma via scenic mountain roads. Check into resort and enjoy leisure time. The journey offers beautiful views of terraced fields and traditional villages. Recommended 1-hour break at Barahsinghe restaurant or Malekhu for refreshments. Evening at leisure to prepare for tomorrow's adventure activities. Overnight in Kusma resort.

itinerary.title: Sky Adventures & Drive to Pokhara
itinerary.description: Early morning sky breakfast at The Cliff followed by your choice of bungee jump or swing - an exhilarating start to the day! After the adrenaline rush, drive to Pokhara via Sarangkot with stunning Annapurna mountain views. Recommended 1-hour break for local food experience (local chicken/mutton) en route. Arrive in Pokhara and check into lakeside resort. Leisure time for paddling, surfing, or boating in Fewa Lake. Optional evening sunset view from Pumdikot. Overnight at Majestic Lake Front or similar.

itinerary.title: Ultralight Flight & ATV Adventure
itinerary.description: Early morning wake-up for a spectacular 30-minute ultralight flight over Pokhara valley with breathtaking views of the Himalayas and Fewa Lake. Return to hotel for breakfast. After breakfast, gear up for an exciting 70-minute ATV ride through scenic trails and countryside. Return to lakeside for leisure time - optional exploration of Majhikuna or Begnas Lake for those seeking more tranquil experiences. Overnight in Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Pokhara to Malekhu
itinerary.description: Drive from Pokhara to Malekhu, enjoying scenic mountain and river views along the way. Check into riverside resort and enjoy leisure time. Recommended activities include enjoying the resort pools, evening bonfire, and peaceful riverside relaxation. This day is designed to slow the pace and prepare for tomorrow's rafting adventure. Overnight in Malekhu resort.

itinerary.title: Rafting Adventure & Return to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning white-water rafting adventure on Trishuli River - 2 hours of exciting rapids and beautiful scenery. After lunch, drive back to Kathmandu with wonderful memories of your 5-day adventure package. The trip concludes with drop-off at your hotel or airport as per your requirement.

tours.fitness_requirements: Moderate physical fitness required. Participants should be comfortable with adventure activities and able to walk on uneven terrain. No serious medical conditions that could be aggravated by high-adrenaline activities.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 5 days before departure. Weather-dependent activities may be rescheduled.

good_to_know.main_attractions: Thrilling bungee jump or swing at The Cliff in Kusma, spectacular 30-minute ultralight flight over Pokhara valley with Annapurna views, exciting 70-minute ATV adventure through scenic trails, peaceful boating and kayaking on pristine Fewa Lake, and exhilarating white-water rafting on Trishuli River.
good_to_know.travel_distances: Kathmandu to Kusma drive takes approximately 4-5 hours through scenic mountain roads, Kusma to Pokhara via Sarangkot requires 2-3 hours with stunning valley views, Pokhara to Malekhu involves 3-4 hours of comfortable driving, and Malekhu to Kathmandu is 2-3 hours return journey.
good_to_know.accommodation_standards: Clean and comfortable resort accommodations in Kusma with mountain views, premium lakeside resorts in Pokhara (Majestic Lake Front or similar) with modern amenities, and riverside resort in Malekhu featuring pools, bonfire facilities, and scenic river views.
good_to_know.additional_activities: Optional paragliding experiences, extended ATV rides, additional water sports at Fewa Lake, cultural village visits, photography sessions at scenic viewpoints, and spa treatments at resorts are available with advance booking; standard terms and conditions apply.

faqs.question: Can this adventure itinerary be customized according to my preferences?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer flexible customization including choice between bungee or swing at Kusma, extended stays at any location, upgraded resort accommodations, additional adventure activities like paragliding, or modified activity schedules to match your adventure preferences and fitness levels.

faqs.question: What specific items are included and excluded from the package price?
faqs.answer: Included are private ground transfers, resort accommodations, specified meals, sky breakfast, choice of bungee or swing, ultralight flight, ATV ride, water sports equipment, rafting experience, professional guides, and safety equipment. Excluded are alcoholic beverages, personal expenses, tips, travel insurance, and optional activities not mentioned.

faqs.question: What is the cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Cancellations made 7 days before departure receive full refund (minus processing fees), 50% refund for cancellations within 3-6 days, and no refund for cancellations less than 2 days before departure. Weather-dependent activities may be rescheduled rather than cancelled.

faqs.question: What is the best time for this adventure package?
faqs.answer: The ideal time is September to May when weather conditions are perfect for outdoor adventures, clear mountain views are guaranteed, and all activities including rafting and flights operate safely with optimal visibility and comfortable temperatures.

faqs.question: How do I book this adventure trip?
faqs.answer: Booking is easy through Gomayu travel agency - contact our adventure specialists directly, use our secure online booking system, or visit our office for detailed consultation about activity options and immediate confirmation with advance activity reservations.

tours.title: Rara Scenic Tour by Flight & Road - 7 Days
tours.description: Discover Nepal's largest and most beautiful alpine lake in the remote far-western region. This unique tour combines scenic flights and overland journey to explore the pristine Rara National Park.

activities.name: Adventure Sports
activities.description: Experience high-altitude lake adventure

activities.name: Cultural Tours
activities.description: Visit remote mountain communities

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Kathmandu to Nepalgunj. Rest and prepare for mountain flight next day. Explore the Terai town and experience different culture.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Talcha Airport, Drive to Rara Lake
itinerary.description: Early morning scenic flight to Talcha Airport (weather permitting). Drive to Rara Lake through beautiful countryside. First glimpse of the stunning Rara Lake.

itinerary.title: Explore Rara Lake
itinerary.description: Full day exploration around Rara Lake. Boat ride on the pristine waters, nature walks around the lake, visit to Rara village and local community interaction.

itinerary.title: Rara Lake Exploration
itinerary.description: Continue exploring Rara National Park. Wildlife spotting, hiking to viewpoints, photography, and enjoying the serene environment of Nepal's hidden gem.

itinerary.title: Rara to Talcha, Fly to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Morning departure from Rara Lake area to Talcha Airport. Flight back to Nepalgunj. Relax and explore the local market.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Nepalgunj to Kathmandu. Free time for last-minute shopping or sightseeing in Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to international airport for departure or extend your stay in Nepal with additional tours.

tours.fitness_requirements: Moderate physical fitness required for altitude and walking.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 21 days before departure

tours.title: Tirupati Balaji South India Tour
tours.description: Outline Itinerary Day 1: Arrival in Chennai – Transfer to Tirupati Day 2: Tirupati – Tirumala Darshan Day 3: Tirupati to Pondicherry Day 4: Pondicherr...

activities.name: Cultural Experience
activities.description: Experience general activities

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Arrival in Chennai – Transfer to Tirupati
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Your journey begins with your arrival at Chennai airport or railway station, where you will be
greeted and assisted for your onward drive to Tirupati, the sacred town famous for the Lord
Venkateshwara Temple. After reaching Tirupati, check into your hotel and relax after the journey.
Take this day to unwind or explore the surroundings at your leisure. Enjoy dinner and an
overnight stay at Tirupati .

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Tirupati – Tirumala Darshan
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Start your day with a hearty breakfast at the hotel before heading to the Tirumala Hills, where
you will visit the renowned Lord Venkateshwara Temple. Experience the divine atmosphere and
seek blessings at this iconic pilgrimage site, often referred to as the “Temple of Seven Hills.”
Spend the day immersed in spiritual activities and return to your hotel in the evening for dinner
and an overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Tirupati to Pondicherry
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, check out and proceed to Pondicherry, a charming coastal town known for its
French colonial architecture and serene ambiance. Upon arrival, begin your exploration with
visits to the Manakula Vinayagar Temple, Auroville Matrimandir, and the Sri Aurobindo Ashram,
each offering a unique spiritual and cultural experience. Later, enjoy the tranquil backwaters at
Chunnambar and relax at Paradise Beach and Promenade Beach, soaking in the beauty of the
coastline. Return to your hotel for an overnight stay in Pondicherry.

itinerary.title: Day 4
itinerary.description:
: Pondicherry to Madurai
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Post breakfast, check out and drive to Madurai, a historic city and one of India’s oldest
continuously inhabited places. Upon arrival, check into your hotel and freshen up. Begin your
sightseeing with a visit to the Thirumalai Nayak Palace, known for its stunning Dravidian and
Rajput architectural fusion. Later, visit the magnificent Meenakshi Amman Temple, a
masterpiece of South Indian temple architecture. End your day with dinner and an overnight
stay in Madurai.

itinerary.title: Day 5
itinerary.description:
: Madurai to Rameshwaram
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, check out and proceed to Rameshwaram, a significant pilgrimage destination
and part of the Char Dham Yatra. En route, stop to admire the engineering marvels of the
Pamban Bridge and Pamban Rail Scissors Bridge, which connect the island of Rameshwaram
to the mainland. On arrival, check into your hotel and relax. Spend the evening exploring the
town or preparing for the next day’s temple visits. Overnight stay in Rameshwaram.

itinerary.title: Day 6
itinerary.description:
: Rameshwaram & Dhanushkodi Excursion
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Begin your day early with a holy dip at Agni Theertham, followed by rituals and darshan at the
Ramanatha Swami Temple, renowned for its 22 sacred wells. After breakfast, visit nearby
attractions including Parvathavarthini Amman Temple, Ramar Patham, Lakshmana Theertham,
Seetha Theertham, and the Panchmukhi Hanuman Temple. Later, take an excursion to
Dhanushkodi, a ghost town with stunning beaches and historical ruins. Return to Rameshwaram
for dinner and an overnight stay

itinerary.title: Day 7
itinerary.description:
: Rameshwaram to Kanyakumari
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Post breakfast, check out and drive to Kanyakumari, the southernmost tip of India. En route,
visit the Suchindram Thanumalayan Temple, a revered site known for its intricate carvings and
spiritual significance. On reaching Kanyakumari, check into your hotel and witness a
mesmerizing sunset at the Kanyakumari Beach. Overnight stay at Kanyakumari.

itinerary.title: Day 8
itinerary.description:
: Kanyakumari Sightseeing
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Start your day early to witness a breathtaking sunrise at Triveni Sangamam, where the Arabian
Sea, Bay of Bengal, and the Indian Ocean meet. After breakfast, visit the Vivekananda Rock
Memorial, a serene monument built on a rocky islet, and the towering Thiruvalluvar Statue,
dedicated to the Tamil poet-saint. Spend the rest of the day exploring the town and soaking in its
cultural vibe. Overnight stay at Kanyakumari.

itinerary.title: Day 9
itinerary.description:
: Kanyakumari to Trivandrum
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast, check out and proceed to Trivandrum (Thiruvananthapuram), the capital of
Kerala. On arrival, visit the famous Shri Padmanabhaswamy Temple, an architectural marvel
and one of the richest temples in the world. Later, explore the city’s attractions including the
Trivandrum Zoo and Museum, known for its diverse collection of flora and fauna. Overnight stay
in Trivandrum.

itinerary.title: Day 10
itinerary.description:
: Trivandrum Departure
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            On your final day, enjoy a leisurely breakfast and check out from the hotel. You will be
transferred to the Trivandrum airport or railway station for your onward journey, carrying with you
the memories of an enriching South India tour.

tours.fitness_requirements: Basic fitness level sufficient.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

tours.title: Upper Mustang Flight & Drive Tour - 6 Days
tours.description: Journey to the forbidden kingdom of Upper Mustang, a restricted area that preserves ancient Tibetan culture and traditions. Explore medieval cities, ancient monasteries, and dramatic desert landscapes.

activities.name: Cultural Tours
activities.description: Explore ancient Tibetan Buddhist culture

activities.name: Adventure Sports
activities.description: High-altitude adventure exploration

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Morning flight to Pokhara, then scenic mountain flight to Jomsom. Arrive in the apple capital of Nepal. Explore Jomsom town and visit local monastery. Overnight in Jomsom.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Charang to Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Drive through the Kali Gandaki valley to Charang. Visit the impressive Charang monastery with ancient murals. Continue to Lo Manthang, the walled capital of former Mustang kingdom.

itinerary.title: Explore Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Lo Manthang's medieval architecture. Visit Jampa Gompa (15th century), Thubchen Gompa, and Choprang Gompa. Meet with local Loba people and experience their unique culture.

itinerary.title: Lo Manthang to Ghar Gompa to Ghami
itinerary.description: Visit ancient Ghar Gompa and explore mysterious sky caves. Drive to Ghami village via different route. See the longest mani wall in Nepal and stay overnight in traditional guesthouse.

itinerary.title: Ghami to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Return journey to Jomsom through scenic Mustang landscapes. Stop at Samar village and Chele. Enjoy last evening in Mustang with mountain views and local hospitality.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Jomsom to Pokhara with spectacular Annapurna and Dhaulagiri views. Connect to Kathmandu flight or extend stay in Pokhara.

tours.fitness_requirements: Good physical fitness required for high altitude activities.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 21 days before departure

tours.description: Experience the sacred Kailash Mansarovar Yatra via helicopter route from Kathmandu. This premium 12-day journey combines helicopter flights with the spiritual pilgrimage, offering comfort and convenience while maintaining the sacred essence of the yatra. The helicopter route significantly reduces travel time while providing breathtaking aerial views of the Himalayas.

itinerary.title: Arrival Kathmandu (1300m
itinerary.description: Upon arrival in Kathmandu Airport, you will be greeted and assisted by our representative after completing your custom formalities,transfer to the hotel for check-in. Overnight at Kathmandu Hotel.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Sightseeing - Fly to Nepalgunj (150M ,1 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast Kathmandu city sightseeing tour, visit  Pasupatinath Temple,Bouddhanath Stupa(World heritage site),Jala Narayan Temple(sleeping Vishnu) back to hotel take lunch evening fly to Nepalgunj,arrive at Nepalgunj transfer to hotel for check in.Overnight at Nepalhunj.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj - Fly to Simikot (2800M ,50 Min)
itinerary.description: After breakfast transfer to domestic airport ,fly to Simikot, arrive at Simikot airport, transfer to hotel for check in. Evening short walk to lord Shiva Temple back to hotel. Overnight at Simikot.

itinerary.title: Simikot - Fly to Hilsa by Helicopter - Drive to Purang (3700M,35 km,2 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast fly to Hilsa by Helicopter (20 Min, 15 Kg weight limit for baggage) wait for the others member to arrive at Hilsa (since it is a group visa and everyone have to enter Tibet side in one group) complete immigration and custom formalities in Nepal - China both side continue drive to Purang ,on the way we have to pass up to 2 Checkpoints where checking might take upto 1 hour each check post) transfer to the Hotel for check-in.overnight at Purang hotel.

itinerary.title: Purang Acclimatization Day (3900M)
itinerary.description: After breakfast all day is free for acclimatization today you can buy Kailash kora clothes,bottle,sticks and others trekking gears for parikrama.Overnight at Purang hotel.

itinerary.title: Purang - Drive to Mansarovar Parikrama (4550M,102 km,4 Hrs - Holy bath,Pooja,Homa)
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Rakshas Tal (40 km, 1.5 hrs) on the way you will have to pass 1 check point. After reaching Rakshas Tal you will see Gurla Mandhata Parvat and first view of Mt.Kailash south face and Manasarovar Lake, 40 Km drive we reach Mansarovar continue Parikrma of Mansarovar lake by Vehicle (102 Km,4 Hrs) and Overnight at the Shore of the Lake.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar - Drive to Yamdwar (60 Km,2 Hrs)- Trek to Diraphuk (4860M, 12 Km - First Day of Kora)
itinerary.description: After breakfast short drive to Darchen, visit Yamdwar.This is starting point of Kora.We will trek to Diraphuk which is 12 km trek (7/8 Hrs) crossing west face of Mt.Kailash,You will visit North face of Mt.Kailash. Arrive at Diraphuk ,transfer to the Guest house for check-in.overnight at Diraphuk.

itinerary.title: Diraphuk - Trek to Zutalphuk (4600M,22 Km - 2nd Day of kora Cross Dolmala Pass)
itinerary.description: After breakfast trek to Dolma -La Pass and trek to Zutalphuk(22 Km,9/10 hrs Trek).This is the most difficult journey throughout  the the yatra since you have to trek up to (5630m) height. From decent to Gaurikund & trek to Zutulphuk following river. Arrive at Zutalphuk transfer to the Guest house for check-in.overnight at Zutalphuk.

itinerary.title: Zutalphuk - Trek to Darchen(08 Km/3 Hrs - Drive to Hilsa  (3700M,100 km 03 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast short trek ( 8 Km ,2 Hrs) and reach to the point where our coach will be waiting and we will drive to Darchen and merge with other member  who were waiting and drive to Hilsa border formalities both side China - Nepal, transfer to hotel for check in.Overnight at Hilsa.

itinerary.title: Hilsa -Fly to  Simikot by Heli -Fly to Nepalgunj – Fly to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: After breakfast fly to Simikot by Helicopter (20 Mins), Take connecting flight to  Nepalgunj again fly back to Kathmandu.arrival at Kathmandu transfer to hotel for check in. Overnight at Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Bhaktapur Durbar Squire and Doleshwar Mahadev Temple
itinerary.description: After breakfast fly to Simikot by Helicopter (20 Mins), Take connecting flight to  Nepalgunj again fly back to Kathmandu.arrival at Kathmandu transfer to hotel for check in. Overnight at Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu departure transfer
itinerary.description: After breakfast we will be provide appreciation certificate of Kailash Mansarovar Yatra later drop to airport for final departure.

tours.title: Kailash Mansarovar Yatra Ex Lhasa - 10 Nights 11 Days
tours.description: tes

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Arrival (1400m) - Overnight in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Your Arrival Time – Airport pickup and transfer to your Hotel. Original passport and photograph collection for Chinese visa processing.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu City Sightseeing
itinerary.description: 08:00 AM – After Breakfast – Full day sightseeing of Pashupatinath Temple, ShaktiPeeth and Budhanilkantha.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu- Lhasa Flight
itinerary.description: After Breakfast: Drive to Kathmandu airport. Take a Morning flight to Lhasa. (1 hrs 15 m). Arrive at Lhasa Gonggar Airport. Upon arrival you will be welcomed with White Khada and transfer to the Hotel. Along the way, you can enjoy the spectacular scenery of Yarlung Tsangpo River, Lhasa River, and the typical Tibetan villages.

itinerary.title: Lhasa Sightseeing: Visit Potala Palace, Jokhang Temple and Barkhor Street
itinerary.description:
Guide will take you to the stunning Potala Palace, from top you can gaze down upon views of Lhasa. The enormous building contains a tiny world inside. Nestled at the base of the Potala Palace, Longwangtan Park awaits you. Enjoy traditional Tibetan cultural experiences and a unique viewpoint of the magnificent Potala Palace from this serene location.
You will travel to the revered Jokhang Temple in the afternoon. Located in the heart of Lhasa’s old town, the Jokhang Temple was built in the seventh century. The temple’s circumference, Barkhor Street, is a fantastic location for souvenir shopping.

itinerary.title: Lhasa – Ali or Purang Flight. And Drive to Mansarovar (4550m)
itinerary.description: Transfer to Airport to fly out to Ali Gunsa Airport or Purang Airport (4,500 m) (2 hrs flight). Pick up from the airport, drive to Mansarovar lake crossing beautiful places and stay at the shore of the Lake. Fill spiritual water. Parikrama of Mansarovar Lake by vehicle (3 hrs – 90 km). Perform Puja (prayer ritual) at Mansarovar Lake.

itinerary.title: First Day of Outer Kora - Trek to Dirapuk (4860m)
itinerary.description: 10:00 AM – After a short drive, we will reach Tarboche and visit Yama Dwar. This is the starting point for Kora. We will trek to Dirapuk (4860 m) which is a 12 km trek (5-6 hrs). You will visit the North face of Mt. Kailash. Travelers who do not want to trek around (Parikrama) Kailash can go back to Darchen and wait for the rest of the group to arrive from Parikrama.
itinerary.meals: Breakfast at Darchen, Packed Lunch, Dinner

itinerary.title: Second Day of Outer Kora - On to Zuthulphuk (4670m) with Trek via Dolma La Pass
itinerary.description: 07:00AM – Trek from Dirapuk to Dolma La Pass and proceed to Zuthulphuk (22 km trek for 8-9 hours trek). The first stage of the trip is a two-hour ascent to Dolma La Pass (5700 m | 18700 ft). The trail brings us past Yamasthal on our way to Shiva-sthal, with each step bringing us closer to the Dolma-La Pass. There are some tea shops before you reach Dolma La Pass where you can have tea and hot refreshments. After Dolma La Pass, the route descends for an hour before straightening out for 2-3 hours till we reach Zuthulphuk. You’ll be able to see Gauri Kunda (The Pond of Goddess Parvati) as well while descending from Dolma la pass.

itinerary.title: Third day of Outer Kora. Kora ends. Drive to Purang or Ali
itinerary.description: 08:00AM – After a short Trek (8kms – 2 – 3hrs) and reach the point where the coach will be waiting, we will drive to Darchen and merge with other members who were waiting and drive to Ali or Purang.

itinerary.title: Flight to Lhasa
itinerary.description: Transfer to Airport and fly to Lhasa. Rest at Lhasa & free day for Shopping.

itinerary.title: Fly from Lhasa to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Fly to Kathmandu airport from Lhasa and transfer to a hotel.
itinerary.accommodation: 5 Star Hotel – Hotel Aloft / Hotel Dusit Princess or similar

itinerary.title: Transfer to Kathmandu Airport
itinerary.description: You will be free till your flight time. We will drop you at the Airport 2 hours before flight time (30 mins drive).

tours.title: Kailash Aerial Darshan - 02 Nights 03 Days
tours.description: Kailash Aerial Darshan
inclusions: Traditional welcome drinks on arrival (Non alcoholic)
02 Nights accommodation at Kathmandu Hotel on AP basis(Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner)
Hindi/English speaking tour guide for entire trip
Gift from the company Kailash Tirtham(jal),Rudraksha Mala
All sightseeing and excursions as mentioned in the itinerary.
All transfers & sightseeing by private air condition vehicle.
Round trip Transportation for Lucknow - Nepalgunj - Lucknow  by Private vehicle
Vehicles are not to be at disposal and are available as per itinerary only (point to point basis).
exclusions: Personal expenses, tipping and any other services which are not mentioned in the above inclusion

itinerary.title: Arrive in Lucknow - Drive to Nepalgunj(190 km, 04/05 Hrs)
itinerary.description: Upon arrival in Lucknow Airport, you will be greeted and assisted by our representative after completing your airport process, drive to Nepalgunj,arrival at Nepalgunj, transfer to Hotel for check-in. Overnight at Nepalgunj Hotel.

itinerary.title: Kailash MansarovarDarshan Chartered Flight(Aerial view - 1.5 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast in the morning our guide will organise group transfer from hotel to Nepalgunj airport where the chartered flight for Kailash Darshan,You will get mesmerizing darshan of holy Mount Kailash and Lake Mansarovar from the window of your flight while flying over the mountains near nepal-Tibet border. The view of mountain and lake from the flight is completely subject to clear weather,back to Nepalgunj transfer to hotel.Overnight at Nepalgunj.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj - Drive to Lucknow departure transfer(190 km,04/05 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast, the morning will be comparatively free and closer to the time of your flight,drive to Lucknow airport on time to board your flight for onward journey.
